item.description:
This trip will sell our FAST! Visit http://www.CTPartyClu... or call (860) 236-3343

Play the games - Check out the music -and have a great time!

PLUS

FREE CONCERT IN THE MOHEGAN SUN WOLF DEN
AMERICA - 40th Anniversary Tour

America hit it big in the 1970s with a string of commercially successful albums.Â The Folk/Rock band's biggest hits include, "A Horse with No Name," "Sister Golden Hair" and "Ventura Highway."

To Listen To AMERICA, Visit http://www.lala.com/#...

You can join the group to see the show, or join the group playing in the Casino
The VIP bus trip includes a $30 VIP BONUS:
$15 Food voucher at any Mohegan Sun Restaurant and $15 of Playing Money

Your seat on the bus pays for itself because your
$30 VIP BONUS pays for your ticket!

We will arrive at Mohegan Sun at 6:00 pm
( The VIP Bonus that you receive can be used to pay for your buffet,
or used at any shop or Restaurant at Mohegan Sun)

Next, you choose between playing at the Casino, or a concert
with at the Wolf's Den at 7 pm

After the concert, enjoy Mohegan Sun Midnight when our bus leaves
The CT Party Club Bus has 50 seats and will sell out quickly - so get your ticket today!

BUS PICKUP SCHEDULE:

BUS PICKUP SCHEDULE:

4:35 Farmington - Commuter Parking Lot on Fienemann Rd, exit 37 off I-84

4:55 Glastonbury - Commuter Parking Lot on Main St
(Route 3) Exit 5 off Route 2 Across from Burger King

5:40 Colchester -Commuter Parking Lot Routes 2 & 149 (Exit 16)
FOR COMMUTER PARKING LOT INFO - CLICK HERE

Arriving at 6:00pm at Mohegan Sun
Concert starts at 8 pm

We have only 50 seats available on a privately chartered PARTY BUS
- so get your ticket before we sell out

ADVANCE TICKETS GUARANTEE YOUR SEAT * Only $35
Tickets are $35 - SPECIAL - 2 Tickets for $60

TICKETS ON THE PARTY BUS ARE $45 IF ANY SEATS REMAIN
( at Glastonbury or Colchester only location - call (860) 236 -3343 for availability )



Visit http://www.CTPartyClu... or Call (860) 236-3343
item.how_to_find_us: Bus pickup locations in 4:35 in Windsor Locks * 4:55 in Glastonbury * 5:40 Colchester
